price: (Ẹ jẹ́) àrọ́mọdọ́mọ àwọn tí A gbé gun ọkọ̀ ojú-omi pẹ̀lú (Ànábì) Nūh. Dájúdájú (Nūh) jẹ́ ẹrúsìn, olùdúpẹ́.
arabic: ذُرِّيَّةَ مَنۡ حَمَلۡنَا مَعَ نُوحٍۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ عَبۡدٗا شَكُورٗا

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: dhurriyyata man ḥamalnā maʿa nūḥin innahu kāna ʿabdan shakūran
